title: Chat with creator via Properchat
description: Subscriber will gain access to message the creator via Properchat direct message

title: Access to the fanswall
description: Subscriber will be able to message on creator's Fanswall

title: Become member of the creator Properchat Group
description: Subscriber will become member of creator Properchat group

title: Download attached files
description: Subscriber will be able to download any attached files on creator posts
